snippet: Put on your chef’s hat for this Wednesday puzzle by Jean O’Conor.
abstract: Put on your chef’s hat for this Wednesday puzzle by Jean O’Conor.
lead_paragraph: We’re up to Wednesday already and now we’re cooking with oil, as Jean O’Conor serves up a puzzle with a full recipe inside. The recipe’s instructions are broken up into five parts with the sixth and final theme answer revealing the mystery dish. So let’s gather round the TABLE and get started.
